Uses of Class
prefuse.visual.VisualTable

  • Packages that use VisualTable 
    Package Description
    prefuse
    The top-level Visualization and Display classes, as well as Constants used throughout the toolkit.
    prefuse.visual
    Classes for representing and storing VisualItems.
